title: Mexican Legends and Murderous Lore
description:
Mexican culture has a strong connection to the dead. They have deep roots in their beliefs of the supernatural world. These beliefs have evolved over centuries of their experiences with ghosts and spirits. While these and stories from other countries can be fun stories to share, we must never forget those who have suffered to teach us these lessons. If we don't pay heed to the lessons, history will be doomed to repeat itself and cause more legends and murderous lore.  

First, an old and malevolent hospital
Followed by a Ouiji board that summons murder
Then, a dance, that leads straight to Hell. 
Finally in our featured story, a love so deep it burns 

To match with a licensed therapist today, go to Talkspace.com. Make sure to use the code SCARY ​to ​get $100 off of your first month​ and show your support for the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
